sentences.en: Luckily we take earplug with us, as the traffic outside our room is very noisy.
sentences.cn: 真幸运，我们带有耳塞，因为房间外面的车辆噪音太大。

sentences.en: Our dog almost died, I learned a new language, I made new friends, I solved new problems, and I got an earplug stuck in my ear. You know, the usual stuff when you travel.
sentences.cn: 我们的狗都快死了，我学会了一种新的语言，认识了新的朋友，解决了各种新问题，塞上了耳塞——一些旅行时就会有的事。

sentences.en: The earplug is moved from ear to ear to indicate the current date.
sentences.cn: 移动耳塞用来指示相应的日期。

sentences.en: The workers have to wear earplug to put up with the deafening moise in the factor.
sentences.cn: 工人们必须带耳塞才能够忍耐工厂里震耳欲聋的噪音.

sentences.en: When go into workshop please ware the safety helmet , safety glasses and earplug , and ware the respirator if necessarily .
sentences.cn: 进入车间必须确保佩戴安全帽、防护眼镜、耳塞，必要时使用口罩。

trans.tran_en: a small piece of rubber that you put inside your ear to keep out noise or water
